name: AttackEntityEvent
description: AttackEntityEvent is fired when a player attacks an Entity. This event is fired whenever a player attacks an Entity in EntityPlayer#attackTargetEntityWithCurrentItem(Entity). target contains the Entity that was damaged by the player. This event is Cancelable . If this event is canceled, the player does not attack the Entity. This event does not have a result. HasResult This event is fired on the MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS .
